data.message: A man at 40 years old can't be rapping about drugs, killing people, it would seem stupid, plus he hasn't got the anger anymore. Em is different, he raps how he feels, all his albums have different feelings and that is how he feels at that time in his life. SSLP- doesn't give a fuck about anything in life, MMLP- angry, Eminem Show - shows that he's a piss taker even when he can be angry at the same time, Encore- he feels fucked up, relapse- telling how he felt when going through drugs, Recovery- starting to get back together and feeling more normal, MMLP- he actually feeling more normal than ever and loves it. For me that's pretty amazing because with every song and album it's a story of his life. Don't diss his new stuff, the mans a legend.

replies.message: Relapse telling how he felt when he was on drugs? The album had a serial killer concept lol.
That's how he felt when on drugs that he was fucked up, and probably could kill someone
Pas d'âge requit pour aimer et écouter Eminem et savoir apprécier ses textes , son univers, j'ai 51 ans et il me parle.
Lmao. No. Recovery is how he felt on his addictions and his struggles and trying to come out better then before. Relapse was just a serial killer themed album. Lmao
Relapse saw him trying to stay old-school but at the same time changing. And Recovery basically happened by accident lmao it was originally gonna be Relapse 2 until Em took a look at the overall flow

Who said a 40 year old cant do drugs and kill people? 
I dont know about his anger neither do u

The man has his kids to look after, and he's matured more now to know that drugs fucked him. And what's he got to be angry about? He's got no reason to be angry at Kim or his mum, that's what all his anger was about
this shit doesnt make any sense...

Tyler Chieffo I know a LOT about Em and from what I heard, he intended on doing Relapse 2, but his producers sort of told him not to, and also he said he was getting sick of writing about drugs and violence and all that shit. Imma look it up.

"I had originally planned for Relapse 2 to come out last year. But as I kept recording and working with new producers, the idea of a sequel to Relapse started to make less and less sense to me, and I wanted to make a completely new album. The music on Recovery came out very different from Relapse, and I think it deserves its own title."
How do you know if SSLP isnt just the same thing?  Expression
Every album he's a lyrical slayer. He's more top notch than ever.
Rap God and Berzerk brang Slim Shady back so MMLP2 is bringing Slim Shady back actually
TRUE RAP ARTIST RECOGNIZE THAT SHADY IS A TRUE RAP GOD.NOTHING FAKE ABOUT HIM.IF PEOPLE DONT LIKE THE KING,,,SUCK ON SOME NUTS #RAPGOD
